website_summaries.verdict: An impressive and challenging set that's loaded with pieces and gorgeous details that make it look more like an artistic masterpiece than a toy once assembled.
pros: Boasts more than 2,200 pieces for an adventurous LEGO project that can entertain the whole family
Features buildable Silent Mary and 8 characters from Pirates of the Caribbean
Has a mid-hull section and ghost sharks, plus numerous ship and sailing-themed accessories
cons: Time-consuming and tedious to assemble, so it's not recommended for young children

customer_reviews.title: It worths every penny
customer_reviews.text: It’s an awesome (and huge) Lego set. Some pieces are tricky to get together but doable nonetheless. I spent about 9 hours building it over two weekends. It looks great as exhibition. Not so sure about playing with it since it looks a bit fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: The set is amazing it truly Represent the original ship of the movie and is a perfect build for father and son when you wanna spend quality time with your child you can always find the pleasure though after and the fun loving joy with your son Build in a lego set
customer_reviews.author: G.Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Boys put it together in two days. Only 446 steps :) My boys are 9 and 7 and still were able to power through it, even though box said 14+ for age. Just a couple tricky pieces they needed help with otherwise they handled the whole thing on their own. Love this set! We're going to leave it together - not starting it again from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Lego kits that Ive put together
customer_reviews.text: .IT was challenging. I enjoyed every minute putting this kit together. It would be a great project for a kid and a parent to do together. I do display this one and everyone that looks at it is totally amazed that its lego. Would recommend this build to ANYONE
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for the older Lego fan!
customer_reviews.text: LEGO - for the teen Lego fanatic! This kit is awesome and offers a bit of an assembling challenge for the older Lego builder. Great quality between characters, extras, etc. My son received for his birthday - took him about 5 hours to assemble. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gift for my daughter. She is an avid LEGO builder and spent a ton of time on this. Quality materials only LEGO can provide and tons of fun for her. Finished project is displayed on her bookshelf. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Klingensmith

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for a toy but a great kit that has a lot of detail. Just too overpriced.

customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she LOVES IT!!!!! She actually stopped after a few hours so she wouldn't do it all in one day. Looks so neat displayed ~~

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!

customer_reviews.title: Best give ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Christmas gift for my grandson, age 9. He went right to work on assembling this amazing Lego set. Focused, he completed it “all by himself” and said it was the very best gift ever!

product_meta.title: LEGO Pirates of The Caribbean Silent Mary 71042 Building Kit Ship
product_meta.description: Bring the magic of Disney's Pirates of the Caribbean to your home with this impressive replica of the Silent Mary ghost pirate ship. This highly detailed LEGO model with over 2,200 pieces features a hinged bow section, opening skeleton hull with decay and destruction detailing, movable rudder, collapsible main mast and two further masts, long bowsprit with crow’s nest and mast, tattered sails, detailed quarterdeck, plus a rowboat with two oars and an array of weapons and accessory elements. This model provides a rewarding build and play experience, and the integrated stand makes it suitable for display in the home or office. Also includes eight minifigures: Captain Jack Sparrow, Henry, Carina, Lieutenant Lesaro, Captain Salazar, Officer Magda, Officer Santos and the Silent Mary Masthead, plus two detachable ghost sharks.
feature_bullets: Features a hinged bow section, opening skeleton hull with decay and destruction detailing, movable rudder, three masts including a collapsible main mast, long bowsprit with crow’s nest and mast, tattered sails, detailed quarterdeck, plus a rowboat with two oars
Includes eight minifigures: Captain Jack Sparrow, Henry, Carina, Lieutenant Lesaro, Captain Salazar, Officer Magda, Officer Santos and the Silent Mary Masthead, plus two detachable ghost sharks
Pirate ship accessory elements include a compass, sextant, monocular, two brooms and a ship-in-a-bottle,Care and Cleaning: Wipe Clean with a Damp Cloth
Special elements include Captain Salazar’s hairpiece and a decorated Galileo Diary with printed cover and astronomy page

The Silent Mary with the main mast in vertical position measures over 18 inches (48cm) high, 26 inches (68cm) long and 8 inches (22cm) wide, and over 14 inches (36cm) wide with the main mast collapsed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars97 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
